Servo start (time[10], servo[1], speed[1], direction[1])
<1234567890A90>

Servo stop

Take picture
                    
15s hitaasti

25 sek nopeasti

35 sek suunnan vaihto

45 sek stop

50 sek startti

	atTime, interval, servo, speed, direction -->autostop kun loppuu

<000001500021045000020000001>

200 steppiä: vaakamotti 500ms (idle 1500ms). 
kääntömotti 100ms  1900idle
-->180 astetta ja 10 cm
<000001550021100500015000200>
<000001500019000100019000200>



Uusi rajapinta (timelapse v5):

vaihtis1:
start					 stop								
day[3]hour[2]min[2]ms[3] day[3]hour[2]min[2]ms[3] servo[1] speed[1] direction[1] runtime[5] idletime[5] 
001 12 12 500			 002 12 12 500			  1		   1        0            02000      05000
-->run for one day, 2 seconds max speed and then sleep 5 second

Vaihtis2:
day[3]hour[2]min[2]ms[3] servo[1] speed[1] direction[1] runtime[5] idletime[5] repeats[4] 
000 01 00 000			 1		   1        0            02000      05000		500
->start at 1 hour, repeat 2 seconds at max speed then sleep 5, stop when repeated 500 times
